TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XPathQueryGenerator extends System.Object
public ref class XPathQueryGenerator abstract sealed

Docs.summary: When given a class representing a data contract, and metadata representing a member of the contract, produces an XPath query for the member.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Per ulteriori informazioni sui contratti dati, vedere [utilizzando i contratti dati](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md).
L'utilizzo della classe prevede l'esecuzione di quattro passaggi:
1. Creare il tipo di contratto dati applicando <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMemberAttribute> al tipo e ai relativi campi o proprietà come appropriato.
2. Utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Type.GetMember%2A> della classe <xref:System.Type> per generare la matrice MemberInfo.
3. Passare il tipo e la matrice al metodo.
4. Se necessario, utilizzare l'oggetto <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> restituito dal parametro `namespaces` per esaminare gli spazi dei nomi XML ai quali viene fatto riferimento dai prefissi degli spazi dei nomi nella query XPath.
> [!NOTE] > Prefisso dello spazio dei nomi "xg" (per "XPath Generator") viene utilizzato come impostazione predefinita nella query XPath. Questo valore non può essere modificato. Al contrario, fare riferimento alla raccolta NameTable per conoscere lo spazio dei nomi al quale è associato il prefisso.
## Examples Nell'esempio seguente vengono create query XPath da due classi alle quali sono stati applicati gli attributi <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMemberAttribute>.
[!code-csharp[XPathQueryGenerator#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathquerygenerator/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XPathQueryGenerator#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathquerygenerator/vb/source.vb#0)]

Docs.summary: Creates an XPath from a data contract.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string CreateFromDataContractSerializer (Type type, System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] pathToMember, out System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager namespaces);

.method public static hidebysig string CreateFromDataContractSerializer(class System.Type type, class System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] pathToMember, [out] class System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager& namespaces) cil managed

public: static System::String ^ CreateFromDataContractSerializer(Type ^ type, cli::array <System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^> ^ pathToMember, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Xml::XmlNamespaceManager ^ % namespaces);
static member CreateFromDataContractSerializer : Type * System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] * -> string

Docs.param: The type that represents a data contract.
The metadata, generated using the method of the class, that points to the specific data member used to generate the query.
The XML namespaces and their prefixes found in the data contract.
Docs.summary: Creates an XPath from a data contract using the specified data contract type, array of metadata elements, and namespaces..
Docs.returns: The XPath generated from the type and member data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Per ulteriori informazioni sui contratti dati, vedere [utilizzando i contratti dati](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md).
## Examples Nell'esempio seguente vengono create query XPath da due classi alle quali sono stati applicati gli attributi <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMemberAttribute>.
[!code-csharp[XPathQueryGenerator#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathquerygenerator/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XPathQueryGenerator#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathquerygenerator/vb/source.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string CreateFromDataContractSerializer (Type type, System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] pathToMember, System.Text.StringBuilder rootElementXpath, out System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager namespaces);

.method public static hidebysig string CreateFromDataContractSerializer(class System.Type type, class System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] pathToMember, class System.Text.StringBuilder rootElementXpath, [out] class System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager& namespaces) cil managed

public: static System::String ^ CreateFromDataContractSerializer(Type ^ type, cli::array <System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^> ^ pathToMember, System::Text::StringBuilder ^ rootElementXpath, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Xml::XmlNamespaceManager ^ % namespaces);
static member CreateFromDataContractSerializer : Type * System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] * System.Text.StringBuilder * -> string

Docs.param: The type that represents a data contract.
The metadata, generated using the method of the class, that points to the specific data member used to generate the query.
The top level element in the xpath.
The XML namespaces and their prefixes found in the data contract.
Docs.summary: Creates an XPath from a data contract using the specified contract data type, array of metadata elements, the top level element, and namespaces.
Docs.returns: The XPath generated from the type and member data.
